fields.description:
Like your boyfriend's but cooler.
54% Cotton, 18% Polyester, 16% Acrylic, 12% Rayon
• Soft knit cotton blend
• Long and lean fit
• Button front
• V-neck
• Hip patch pockets
• Ribbed neck, cuffs and hem
Imported, Machine Wash
Stylish swimsuit in black and white diamonds
No description
The classic herringbone suit gets a modern update with a dose of this rich shade of burgundy.

This bundle includes the following (from left to right):
Carters summer dress with diaper cover
Carters summer dress with diaper cover
Moxie Jean offers FREE SHIPPING on orders over $40. Ordinary rate is a flat $5.95 per order.
Ten-minute Bento is a bento cook-book in English written by Megumi Fujii.

colour: coral/brown print 
fabric: thick stretch cotton/polyester
fit: small fitting (we suggest you go up a size)
length: approx 43cm waist to hem
feature: gold zip detailing

for combination to oily skin conditions

the first step for “pore-less skin”

a lightweight cleansing oil that leaves the skin clean, fresh and refined.

fields.description:
Smooth, stretchy jersey with wide-stripe pattern.
Strapless.
Easy, relaxed silhouette can be styled four ways.

Striped cotton canvas. Banded waist with belt loops. Button closure, zip fly. Flat front. Angled side pockets with slot pocket on one side. Rear besom pockets.
Loose and relaxed. For a slimmer fit, please consider ordering one size down. Sits below the waist. Straight through the hip and thigh. Hits at mid-thigh. Inseams (unrolled): regular: 10", tall: 11", petite: 8"
